nodes.text: Yethra was an astronomical object with a terrain that consisted of ice sheets. While serving in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, TIE fighter pilot Yrica Quell flew above the surface of Yethra with fellow pilots Xion and Major Soran Keize. During the mission, Xion guided Quell, warning her of enemies attempting to pursue, after the latter pilot had become blinded by the reflection of a sun from the ice sheets. Around 5 ABY, Quell, who had since defected to the New Republic, was fighting in the planet Troithe's capital district, she began reliving her experience at Yethra in her mind.
Yethra appeared through flashbacks in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
